preference.name: SIEMENStozipfile_MSWord_ets_dst_relation_to_src
preference.preference_description: Specifies if a relation must be created between the Microsoft Word source dataset and destination dataset. Valid Values: true - Creates a relation between the source and destination dataset. false - Does not create a relation between the source and destination dataset.
